TheMightyAmondee.WeatherTotemsCP/SunTote: Activate to greatly increase the chance for sun tomorrow. Consumed on use.
TheMightyAmondee.WeatherTotemsCP/WindTot: Activate to greatly increase the chance for wind tomorrow. Will not work on Ginger Island. Consumed on use.
TheMightyAmondee.WeatherTotemsCP/SnowTot: Activate to greatly increase the chance for snow tomorrow. Will not work on Ginger Island. Consumed on use.
TheMightyAmondee.WeatherTotemsCP/Thunder: Activate to greatly increase the chance for a storm tomorrow. Will not work on Ginger Island. Consumed on use.
TheMightyAmondee.WeatherTotemsCP/GreenRa: Activate to greatly increase the chance for green rain. Will not work on Ginger Island. Consumed on use. Only works in summer.
